name: Only (JohnGabrielUK)
description:
"Pay no mind to what's going on out there. It's no concern of ours. We're safe here."

Only is a short Metroidvania-style platformer taking place on a series of very small planets.

Controls

Control the character with the arrow keys.
Press X to jump and E to go through doors.
When unlocked, press Z to dash and C to punch.

Credits

Design, code & art by JohnGabrielUK
Player sprite by D4yz_Ag0

Screen Saver by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5715-screen-saver
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Only was made for the twenty-third Godot Wild Jam.
The source code is available here.
